Results.Title: Attack on Titan
Results.Plot: Eren Jaeger, fueled by the death of his mother at the hands of the titans, vows revenge against the species, that after 100 years of peace have breached through the enclosing walls, threatening the remains of humanity.
Results.Stars: Yûki Kaji, Marina Inoue, Josh Grelle, Yui Ishikawa

Results.Title: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba
Results.Plot: A family is attacked by demons and only two members survive - Tanjiro and his sister Nezuko, who is turning into a demon slowly. Tanjiro sets out to become a demon slayer to avenge his family and cure his sister.
Results.Stars: Natsuki Hanae, Yoshitsugu Matsuoka, Hiro Shimono, Akari Kitô

Results.Title: One Piece
Results.Plot: Follows the adventures of Monkey D. Luffy and his pirate crew in order to find the greatest treasure ever left by the legendary Pirate, Gold Roger. The famous mystery treasure named "One Piece".

Results.Title: My Hero Academia
Results.Plot: A superhero-loving boy without any powers is determined to enroll in a prestigious hero academy and learn what it really means to be a hero.

Results.Title: Belle

Results.Stars: Mamoru Hosoda, Kaho Nakamura, Ryô Narita, Shôta Sometani, Tina Tamashiro

Results.Title: Jujutsu Kaisen

Results.Title: Naruto: Shippûden
Results.Plot: Naruto Uzumaki, is a loud, hyperactive, adolescent ninja who constantly searches for approval and recognition, as well as to become Hokage, who is acknowledged as the leader and strongest of all ninja in the village.

Results.Title: Spirited Away

Results.Title: Ranking of Kings

Results.Title: Psycho-Pass
Results.Plot: Believing in humanity and order, policewoman Akane Tsunemori obeys the ruling, computerized, precognitive Sibyl System. But when she faces a criminal mastermind who can elude this "perfect" system, she questions both Sibyl and herself.
Results.Stars: Kana Hanazawa, Miyuki Sawashiro, Takahiro Sakurai, Shizuka Itô

Results.Title: Redo of Healer
Results.Plot: Keyaru is a healing magician who is sexually abused repeatedly by others. Using his healing magic, he goes back four years into the past to get revenge on the ones who abused him.
Results.Stars: Yuya Hozumi, Ayano Shibuya, Shizuka Ishigami, Natsuki Aikawa
